sentences.finnish: Jani ja Jussi matkustavat Suomesta Ranskaan.
sentences.english: Jani and Jussi are traveling from Finland to France.
From France, they are traveling to Egypt.
From Egypt, they are traveling to India.
From India, they are traveling to China.
From China, they are traveling to Australia.
From Australia, they are traveling to Tanzania.
From Tanzania, they are traveling to Morocco.
From Morocco, they are traveling to Argentina.
From Argentina, they are traveling to Ecuador.
From Ecuador, they are traveling to Mexico.
From Mexico, they are traveling to Canada.
From Canada, they are traveling to Finland.
